name: Love Quotes - Images & messages
description: Whether to say I love you, Good morning, Good night or to attach a love message or a card with a gift for your beloved , we have prepared for you a collection of messages and cards of love.  We offer different message formats ranging from simple text to a fully personalized love card.  Whatever the format, you can then send your love quotes on Messenger, Whatsapp, Facebook and other social networks and instant messaging tools.  You can send love quotes using the following formats:  1 / Text message: this is the fastest way to make love quotes by sending a text chosen from a selection of several hundred original messages.  2 / Simple love card: this is a quick and easy way to create a personalized love image: After selecting a text or writing a text of your choice, you must choose a background image then choose the style and color of the text then the card is ready.   3 / Advanced love card: Using our card editor you can personalize your love cards by:  Using love images from the phone gallery or phone camera or from the app background image gallery Putting one or more predefined or personalized texts and positioning them freely on the love card. We have prepared love quotes and cards for different occasions:  Valentines Day I love you Good morning Good night  We also offer content in French, English, Spanish, German and Portuguese. We plan to add more languages in the coming days.  We are trying to make advertising less intrusive to allow you to have a pleasant user experience using our application. Advertising helps us generate revenue so that we can continue to provide you with a better and richer content and new features over time.  If you have any questions about using the app or any suggestions, please dont hesitate to contact us on our email: products@amineware.com
